mapper.select: SELECT pm.* FROM p_menu pm INNER JOIN p_role_menu prm ON pm.id = prm.menuId INNER JOIN p_user_role pur ON prm.roleId = pur.roleId LEFT JOIN p_plugin pp ON pm.pluginId = pp.pluginId WHERE pm.type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND pur.userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND pm.menuType in(0, 1) AND (pp.pluginId IS NULL OR pp.status = 1) order by pm.seq asc
